data.name: SPS Vancouver 2020
data.description: Administrators, end-users, architects, developers, and other professionals that work with Microsoft Collaboration or Cloud Technologies will meet to share the latest information for working with SharePoint, Microsoft365, the Power Platform and related offerings from Microsoft.
